snippet.title: The Forgotten City - PC Gaming Show Trailer
snippet.description:
Add The Forgotten City to your wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/874260/The_Forgotten_City/

We were part of the PC Gaming Show with The Forgotten City, our mature narrative-driven game by Modern Storyteller. We shared a new trailer there that we hope you will like.

You can follow the game on Twitter & Facebook not to miss news about the game.
Twitter: https://twitter.com/modnstoryteller
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Modern-Storyteller-The-Forgotten-City-415000898693530/

Don't forget to also follow us on social media if you don't want to miss any news about the game:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DearVillagers
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DearVillagers/
